free.title: Core Reading
features: AI personality analysis from birth chart (Part 1)

premium.title: Full Analysis
features: 9 sections (personality, career, love, wealth, health & more)

items.q: What is Four Pillars of Destiny (BaZi)?
items.a: Four Pillars of Destiny, also known as BaZi, is a traditional East Asian astrological system that builds four pillars (year, month, day, and hour) from your exact birth date and time to analyze the flow of your destiny. Our engine references five classical texts including Di Tian Sui and Zi Ping Zhen Quan.

items.q: What's the difference between Free and Premium?
items.a: The free reading covers your AI personality profile, Day Stem card, Five Elements balance, and Yin-Yang ratio — everything about your innate character. Premium unlocks a full 9-section deep-dive: personality, career, love & relationships, wealth, health, past, present, future, and your major luck cycle timeline.

items.q: How does AI analyze my birth chart?
items.a: Our traditional calendar engine precisely calculates your Jieqi boundaries and Four Pillars, then state-of-the-art AI models (Claude/GPT) apply the interpretive frameworks from five classical BaZi texts to generate a fully personalized report.

items.q: What if I don't know my birth time?
items.a: You can still get a reading without your birth time. The hour pillar will simply be omitted, which slightly reduces the depth of the analysis. We recommend checking your birth certificate or asking a family member to find it.
We only use your date of birth and gender for the analysis. Your name is used solely for display in your report. The free reading requires no login and data is automatically deleted after 90 days.

No chart is inherently good or bad. BaZi reflects the unique pattern of your innate strengths and the natural rhythm of your luck cycles over time. FortuneLab provides probabilistic interpretations — not a basis for medical, legal, or financial decisions.

finalCta.heading: Your Birth Chart Awaits
